Params: {2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'Perhaps the anti-royalists thought they could smear the name of Akdilek behind my back and force me into submission.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'But they failed to acknowledge my strength and that I have no intention to become their puppet of a princess.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'That night, when Sophia was brought in front of me. I held my head high and told her the truth.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'She made her choice herself, though it took her some time to do so... To be honest, I was a bit worried she would refuse.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: "Since asking me to take care of Sophia was Andre's last words. He saw her as a daughter of his own."}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: "Sigh, how dare he ask me, one still hasn't been engaged, to do something like this. I only have experience in raising subordinates, so I guess that will have to do."}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'I originally wanted her to become a pawn for me to control, a sword to protect me, but as I watched her grow, I started having other thoughts.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'And perhaps I already had thoughts of helping her "leave the nest" long ago.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'Perhaps what happened with "Ashlar" helped push me in the right direction.'}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: "Even though they are skilled in inciting people, I can't comprehend why they think they can hide things from me when their servants are all spies for me."}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: "Well, that's that. Sophia volunteered to become my guard afterward and the rest is history."}

{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'I only want to say that, sending Sophia up to Babylonia is not for a "trade" nor is she a "hostage". I genuinely hope for this little girl, who has been on this train for her whole life, to be able to experience the world outside.'}

{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'I may not be able to apologize to her directly, but I am still responsible for all the blood on her hands. And it\'s all thanks to these "necessary sacrifices" that Akdilek has been enjoying peace since I took over'}

{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: "I'm really conflicted about her future. On one hand, I want her to become even stronger, but on the other, I want her to enjoy life like a girl her age should. Never mind... It's not something I can decide at the moment."}
{2: "Jamilah's Letter", 3: 'Forgive me for being selfish and entrusting "her" to you. Please train her with care and kindness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Ha, never thought Akdilek's Amir would ask me for a favor like that. Guess I don't have a choice.", 4: '1'}
